title: Steak Salad
ingredients: ['100g spinach, washed', '1/2 avocado, cut into chunks', '100g beef sandwich steak, marinated as desired and sliced', '1/2 clove garlic, finely diced', 'white mushrooms, quartered', '1 hard-boiled egg, halved', 'shaved Parmesan cheese', 'For the Dressing', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil']
